page.title: 13A (school) DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: (Tony, age 13): I rise at 7.30, get dressed and have a cup of tea. I then take my Yorkshire Terrier for a walk. 30 minutes later I get back and watch Breakfast Television for a half hour. At 8.30 I leave the house, walk round the corner and knock for Steve to go to school. With our other mate, Paul, we stop at the sweet shop and then have 15 minutes to get to school. At school we do the same subjects each week. At the end of school we walk home. At night I might watch T.V. or sometimes I have homework, but I usually do that at school. On Tuesday and Thursday nights we go to cadets in our uniform.
